Availability: Rare whip, 16 gp
The stylish and colorful silk sashes are normally used to safely secure items to their wearerâ€™s waist. A cunning silkman designed a sash that could be used as a whip when other weapons are unavailable. Stories tell of a family who, having been disarmed and taken prisoner by bandits, lashed their captors to death with silken sashes. You can draw the whip as a bonus action by tugging on the sash's knot to reveal a hidden handle. The whip-sash functions as a normal whip.
